mapper.select: select a.id, a.plan_code, a.department_id, a.repair_type_id, a.person_main_liable_id, a.person_main_liable_name, a.person_profession_liable_id, a.person_profession_liable_name, a.equipment_number, a.equipment_name, case when ISNULL(a.plan_start_date) then '' else DATE_FORMAT(a.plan_start_date,'%Y-%m-%d') end as plan_start_date, case when ISNULL(a.plan_end_date) then '' else DATE_FORMAT(a.plan_end_date,'%Y-%m-%d') end as plan_end_date, case when ISNULL(a.real_start_date) then '' else DATE_FORMAT(a.real_start_date,'%Y-%m-%d') end as real_start_date, case when ISNULL(a.real_end_date) then '' else DATE_FORMAT(a.real_end_date,'%Y-%m-%d') end as real_end_date, case a.plan_state when 0 then '未完成' when 1 then '已完成' else '未知' end as plan_state, a.repair_content, a.is_affect_output, a.complete_user_id, a.complete_user_name, a.remark, a.remind_days, a.create_user_id, a.create_user_name, DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as create_time, a.modify_user_id, a.modify_user_name, DATE_FORMAT(a.modify_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as modify_time, b.organization_name from product_oi_plan_repair a INNER JOIN t_humanresource_organization b ON a.department_id = b.id where (#{condition.departmentId} = '' or a.department_id = #{condition.departmentId}) and (#{condition.equipmentNumber} = '' or a.equipment_number = #{condition.equipmentNumber}) and (#{condition.startDate} = '' or a.plan_start_date >= case when #{condition.startDate} = '' then null else #{condition.startDate} end) and (#{condition.endDate} = '' or a.plan_start_date <= case when #{condition.endDate} = '' then null else #{condition.endDate} end) and (#{condition.repairContent} = '' or a.repair_content like concat('%',#{condition.repairContent},'%')) and (#{condition.planState} = -1 or a.plan_state = #{condition.planState}) order by ${condition.order} ${condition.orderby}
